American Federation of Teachers. Local 1460 (United Federation of College Teachers) (New York, N.Y.)
American Federation of Teachers. Local 1460 (United Federation of College Teachers) (New York, N.Y.)
American Federation of Teachers. Local 1460 (United Federation of College Teachers) (New York, N.Y.)
Circa 1970s

This collection documents a unionizing drive for faculty at New York University in the 1970s. The collection contains issues of the Over Due Gazette - a newsletter about the union efforts, NYU Federation of United Professionals Newsletter, NYU Workers' Voice, and material relating to the United Federation of College Teachers (UFCT).
Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
